name: .EXIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .EXIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Information file that contains metadata about an image captured with a digital camera; may include information such as the camera model, shutter speed, aperture, exposure, ISO, focal length, flash on/off, and other information.

content: EXIF data is typically contained within the same file as the image data and can often be viewed in image editing programs by selecting "Get Info" when viewing the photo. Therefore, most JPEG images that include EXIF data use the standard .JPG extension. However, EXIF data may also be saved to a separate file with an ".exif" extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
